hero.title: Order Delicious Traditional Food with Kabseh App
hero.subtitle: Experience the authentic taste of traditional cuisine delivered right to your doorstep. Fast, fresh, and full of flavor - that's what Kabseh brings to your table.

about.subtitle: About Kabseh
about.title: #1 Food Delivery App
about.description: Kabseh connects you with the finest traditional restaurants in your area. From aromatic rice dishes to succulent grilled meats, we deliver authentic flavors that remind you of home cooking.

highResolution.title: High Quality Images
highResolution.description: Browse through stunning high-resolution photos of our dishes to make your selection easier and more appetizing.

retinaReady.title: Mobile Optimized
retinaReady.description: Our app is perfectly optimized for all devices, ensuring a smooth ordering experience on any screen size.

editableData.title: Customizable Orders
editableData.description: Personalize your meals with special instructions, dietary preferences, and portion adjustments to suit your taste.

fullySecured.title: Secure Payments
fullySecured.description: Your payment information is fully protected with advanced encryption and secure payment gateway integration.

cloudStorage.title: Order History
cloudStorage.description: Access your previous orders anytime and reorder your favorite meals with just a few taps.

fullyResponsive.title: Real-time Tracking
fullyResponsive.description: Track your order from kitchen to doorstep with live updates and estimated delivery times.

install.title: Download the App
install.description: Get Kabseh from your app store and create your account to start exploring traditional flavors in your area.

setup.title: Choose Your Meal
setup.description: Browse our extensive menu of traditional dishes, read reviews, and select your favorite meals to add to cart.

enjoy.title: Enjoy Fresh Food
enjoy.description: Sit back and relax while we prepare and deliver your authentic traditional meal hot and fresh to your door.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.subtitle: Get in Touch!
contactUs.description: We're here to help you with any questions or concerns you may have. Please fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contactUs.successMessage: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
contactUs.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.

validation.vehicleYearMin: Vehicle year must be at least 2 characters

easySteps.description2: Create your account and setup your profile to start exploring traditional flavors in your area.

registerResturant.title: Join Kabseh JO!
registerResturant.description1: Kabseh takes zero commission and no registration fees.
registerResturant.description2: You earn more, and we handle the delivery.
registerResturant.description3: Fill out the form now and start reaching more customers with less cost.

registerCaptin.title: Join Kabseh’s Delivery Team!
registerCaptin.description1: Apply now and start working as a Kabseh Captain with weekly payments, performance bonuses, orders from local restaurants near you, and flexible working hours!

clients.title: Top Restaurant
clients.subtitle: Brands in Jordan
clients.description: Partner with Jordan's most trusted restaurant brands and enjoy seamless food delivery

downloadApp.title: Download Our App Today
downloadApp.subtitle: Experience the best food delivery service with our mobile app. Order faster, track easier, and enjoy exclusive mobile-only deals.

discover.title: Discover Local Flavors
discover.description: Scroll through your city's favorite spots. Support local restaurants with every order!

deals.title: Unlock Daily Deals
deals.description: What you see is what you pay. No hidden fees, no commission... Just fair prices and real food, straight from your neighborhood.

track.title: Track Every Bite
track.description: From kitchen to your doorstep, always fresh. Fast, fair, and always fresh.

cta.title: Get The App & Start Ordering
cta.description: Join thousands of food lovers who trust our app for fast, reliable delivery. Available on both iOS and Android platforms.
